data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: The treaty also set guidelines about moving the foreign troops that were in Germany. The USSR was ____ move ____ of ____ troops ____ of ____ Germany ____ eastern Berlin by 1994. The ____ western ____ were ____ to ____ their ____ in Berlin until ____ Soviets ____ left. Germany also promised not to allow NATO troops move into eastern Germany, and not to allow certain types of weapons in the east either.

The th___ western all___ were as___ to ke__ their tro___ in Berlin until t__ Soviets h__ left. data.answer: 该条约还为转移驻扎在德国的外国军队制定了指导方针。苏联计划在1994年之前将所有军队撤出德国东部和柏林东部。三个西方盟国被要求把他们的军队留在柏林，直到苏联人离开。德国还承诺不允许北约军队进入德国东部，也不允许某些类型的武器进入德国东部。
